description: A sophisticated autonomous container orchestration system that transforms sequential execution into parallel, intelligent, and experimentation-focused agent ecosystem

functional.title: Parallel Task Orchestration
functional.description: System must decompose complex tasks into parallel subtasks with intelligent dependency management
acceptance_criteria: Tasks with 3+ independent subtasks are automatically orchestrated in parallel

functional.title: Polyglot Agent Specialization
functional.description: Agents must be domain specialists with cross-cutting tool knowledge
acceptance_criteria: DevOps agents handle GitHub, CI/CD, and infrastructure
Platform agents handle Power Platform and M365 ecosystems
Code agents handle multi-language development and analysis

Reynolds comments provide encouragement and context

functional.title: Experimentation Framework
functional.description: System must support 'what if' scenarios and comparative analysis
acceptance_criteria: Sandbox environments for testing different strategies

non_functional.title: Performance
non_functional.description: System must achieve significant speedup over sequential execution

non_functional.title: Reliability
non_functional.description: System must prevent infinite loops and gracefully handle failures

non_functional.title: Scalability
non_functional.description: System must scale agent pools based on demand

technical: Must use Docker containers for agent isolation

business: Must prioritize experimentation over pure speed

orchestration_effectiveness.description: Percentage of tasks that benefit from orchestration vs direct execution

parallel_execution_improvement.description: Average speedup achieved through parallel execution

agent_coordination_success.description: Success rate of multi-agent coordinated tasks

reynolds_satisfaction_score.description: Subjective quality rating from Reynolds personality engine

experimentation_insights.description: Number of actionable insights generated from experiments
